FuncDef: This command configures an IPv6 filter ID that is applied to all ingress packets entering the VPLS service. The filter overrides any existing ingress IPv6 filter applied to SAPs or SDP bindings for packets associated with the routing IP interface. The override filter is optional and when it is not defined or it is removed, the IPv6 routed packets use the any existing ingress IPv6 filter on the VPLS virtual port.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IPv6 filter ID. This parameter is required when executing the v6-routed-override-filter command. The specified filter ID must exist as an IPv6 filter within the system or the override command fails.
